items.title: Nvidia shares plunge amid $5.5bn hit over export rules to China
items.description: The chip manufacturing giant will require licences to export its H20 AI chip to China.

items.title: WHO agrees legally binding pandemic treaty
items.description: The agreement is designed to ensure more cooperation between nations in the event of another pandemic.

items.title: Peru's ex-president and first lady sentenced to 15 years in jail
items.description: A court ruled that Humala, who governed Peru from 2011 to 2016, took illegal campaign contributions.

items.title: Peru's ex-president and first lady sentenced to 15 years in jail

items.title: French row with Algeria escalates further with tit-for-tat expulsions
items.description: France recalls its ambassador to Algeria and orders 12 Algerian diplomats to leave as tensions continue to rise.
